Review_title: Gets your mind in the right space
Review_Text: If your curious about mindfulness & how it could help you this movie will show you how others have used this to achieve inner peace & greater happiness. Good way to lift your spirits & get you in the right mind space

Review_title: Great documentary detailing a profound transformative process
Review_Text: This timely movie details the gradual rise in the popularity of mindfulness as a grassroots movement to worldwide popularity. Mindfulness' popularity is underlined by the thousands of studies attesting to it's ability to reduce fear, pain and suffering.
